role_description: An Ansible role that installs wget on nearly any platform
role_description_full_overview: The [wget](https://www.gnu.org/software/wget/) command is a command line utility for downloading files from the Internet. It supports downloading multiple files, downloading in the background, resuming downloads, limiting the bandwidth used for downloads and viewing headers.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs wget on nearly any platform.
